about_the_game:
This content features an additional BGM pack with BGM tracks of past Atelier series titles.
Titles featured:

- Atelier Marie
- Atelier Elie
- Atelier Lilie
- Atelier Judie
- Atelier Viorate
- Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana
- Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny
- Atelier Iris 3: Grand Phantasm
- Mana Khemia
- Mana Khemia 2
- Atelier Totori
- Atelier Meruru
- Atelier Ayesha
- Atelier Escha & Logy
- Atelier Shallie
- Atelier Sophie
- Atelier Firis
- Atelier Lise
- Atelier Annie
- Atelier Lina
- Atelier Marie, Elie, & Anis
- Marie & Elie ~Our Atelier~
- Hermina & Culus

name: Atelier Lulua: Atelier Series Legacy BGM Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better, Graphic Memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better, Graphic memory 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
